mapper.select: SELECT a.*, sd.value as status_value, sd.remark as status_color, b.title as goods_name, u.nickname as merchant_name FROM shop_goods_onebuy a LEFT JOIN shop_goods b ON (a.goods_id = b.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON (b.user_id=u.userId) left join `sys_dict` sd on(a.status=sd.code and sd.type='goods_onebuy_status') WHERE id = #{id}
